plot: Irina, a former etoile and nowadays a very important choreographer takes under her protection a young dancer. As the time passes, the young dancer, Vera, will fall in love with Mitia, Irina's lover.
title: Pájaros de cristal
plot_es: Irina, a former etoile and nowadays a very important choreographer takes under her protection a young dancer. As the time passes, the young dancer, Vera, will fall in love with Mitia, Irina's lover.
plot_en: Irina, a former etoile and nowadays a very important choreographer takes under her protection a young dancer. As the time passes, the young dancer, Vera, will fall in love with Mitia, Irina's lover.
